name: The Last Honey Biscuit
description:
You are the last Honey Biscuit, the most delicious Christmas treat the world has laid its eyes upon, however, your kind has been ravaged by the Arch Nemesis Kourabies, a fearful opponent fueled by wrath... Collect all the necessary ingredients to make more of your kind and face the Arch Nemesis in this short mini-game crafted for Christmas (just barely) from the team of Vongrid sincerely to you! 

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Movement
Space: Jump (hold to gain more height)
Z: Fire
Don't forget to wall climb/jump!
